extra.desc: 4 2 E scales justice scale~ As you look at the scales, you notice that they seem to sway back and forth of their own accord, as if weighing something that is to you still unseen. ~ scales justice scale~ As you look at the scales, you notice that they seem to sway back and forth of their own accord, as if weighing something that is to you still unseen.

longDesc: Two beautiful plates shaped like scales have been left here.

extra.desc: 19 -1 E scroll parchment~ It seems to be some sort of spell designed to transport its user across vast distances, but how to make use of it is impossible to tell. ~ scroll parchment~ It seems to be some sort of spell designed to transport its user across vast distances, but how to make use of it is impossible to tell.

longDesc: You see a solid and silver-lined scroll resting on the ground.

extra.desc: sword blazing~ The edge of the blade is lined with writing, religious verse apparently, in a fine, silver-laced and flowing script. ~ sword blazing~ The edge of the blade is lined with writing, religious verse apparently, in a fine, silver-laced and flowing script.

longDesc: You are startled by the sight of a sword that glows as you approach it.
A weighty looking shield has been abandoned by one unworthy to hold it.

extra.desc: 5 -1 E armband faded band~ It has some sort of militia insignia on it, perhaps an indication of a rank or award in some military order unknown to you. ~ armband faded band~ It has some sort of militia insignia on it, perhaps an indication of a rank or award in some military order unknown to you.

longDesc: A ragged and faded looking piece of cloth has been left here, forgotten.
A stunning curved blade glistens on the ground.

extra.desc: 12 10 E ember charred~ It glares back at you, almost angrily. ~ ember charred~ It glares back at you, almost angrily.

longDesc: You glance briefly at a smouldering ember that rests at your feet.

extra.desc: 13 10 E ethereal flame~ Even being near it fills you with a peaceful and comforted feeling. ~ ethereal flame~ Even being near it fills you with a peaceful and comforted feeling.

longDesc: The entire room is aglow from the flame at your feet.

extra.desc: key gates~ There are no gates.  They are inside of you. ~ key gates~ There are no gates.  They are inside of you.

longDesc: You have found at last the Key to the Gates of eternity.

extra.desc: history burnt book~ So this is the jester's joke.  All of our works have turned to dust, and will end in nothing.  It is for this that he laughs. ~ history burnt book~ So this is the jester's joke.  All of our works have turned to dust, and will end in nothing.  It is for this that he laughs.

longDesc: You have found a burnt book, some forgotten history lying on the ground.

extra.desc: 19 3 E surah book~ Al-Kafirun Say: "Oh ye that reject the Faith, I do not worship what you worship, nor do you worship what I worship.  To you be your Way, and to me mine." ~ surah book~ Al-Kafirun Say: "Oh ye that reject the Faith, I do not worship what you worship, nor do you worship what I worship.  To you be your Way, and to me mine."

longDesc: You notice a thin parchment, with flowing script and rich decorative trim.
It is surely the best of men who has left these gloves to aid you.

extra.desc: 12 5 E ankh~ It is an even earlier version of the old Christian cross, an oval loop above the crossed arms of white gold. ~ ankh~ It is an even earlier version of the old Christian cross, an oval loop above the crossed arms of white gold.

longDesc: You see a beautiful pendant of ancient and noble craftsmanship.
You have found a beautiful gleaming disc with a golden image of the sun god.
You frown in disgust at the hideous icon of a false god that you have found.
